presets.label: Enable Review Screen
presets.description: Enable the item review screen / navigator.

presets.label: Enable Mark for Review
presets.description: Enable mark for review of items. Requires the Review Screen option.

presets.label: Informational Item Usage
presets.description: Force the item to be considered as informational and not taken into account in (un)answered / flagged counters.

presets.label: Display End Test Warning
presets.description: Display a warning before the test-taker ends the test.

presets.label: Display Next Part Warning
presets.description: Display a warning before the test-taker ends the test part.

presets.label: Display Next Section Warning
presets.description: Display a warning before the test-taker skips the section. Requires the Section Skipping option.

presets.label: Hide Timed Section Warning
presets.description: Hide the warning automatically displayed when a test-taker exit a timed section.

presets.label: Display Unanswered Warning
presets.description: Display a warning before the test-taker ends a test part and there are still items left unanswered or marked for review.

presets.label: Do not show alert on timeout
presets.description: Moving to the next item without time limit reached message.

presets.label: Answer Eliminator
presets.description: Allow the test-taker to eliminate / strikethrough answers in choice interactions.

presets.label: Answer Masking
presets.description: Allow the test-taker to mask and unmask answers in choice interactions.

presets.label: Area Masking
presets.description: Allow the test-taker to mask parts of the item with a movable mask.

presets.label: Calculator
presets.description: Allow the test-taker to use a basic calculator.

presets.label: Calculator BODMAS
presets.description: Allow the test-taker to use a calculator respecting the order of operations (BODMAS).

presets.label: Scientific Calculator
presets.description: Allow the test-taker to use a scientific calculator.

presets.label: Highlighter
presets.description: Allow the test-taker to highlight parts of the item text.

presets.label: Line Reader
presets.description: Allow the test-taker to visually isolate a line of text.

presets.label: Magnifier
presets.description: Allow the test-taker to use a movable magnifier tool.

presets.label: Zoom
presets.description: Allows Test-taker to zoom in and out the item content.

presets.label: APIP Text To Speech
presets.description: Allow Test-taker to playback media files associated according to APIP protocol to item content.
